short_summary: One View Software Licenses or equivalent with Support and maintenance
description: Bids must be submitted through the P2P portal by the date and time indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Title:** One View Software Licenses or equivalent with Support and Maintenance
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM019537/23788
* **Publication Date:** September 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 26, 2023, at 14:00:00 (EDT)

### Notes

This solicitation is now expired. 

### Conditions of the Tender

* **Document Categories:** Data Centre Services
* **Sourcing Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Registration Required:** Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to view solicitations, submit responses, receive updates, and be awarded contracts.

### Procurement Details

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR) and Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada and National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Sandra Ladouceur
* **Contact Email:** sandra.ladouceur2@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** 613-302-0766
* **Contact Fax:** 613-960-6026
* **Contact Address:** 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8

### Download the Solicitation Details

You may download the solicitation details from the SSC P2P portal at the following URL:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/14DEE2FF-B74C-4D6A-B344-C1FE2E66BF0C ( Eng )
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/B96F27A2-A757-4B38-9B88-84B48DBE7696 (Fra)

*   You are also required to submit your bid through the P2P portal.

Let me know if you need any further assistance! 

P.S. - Sometimes, the contractors may even provide the relevant links or URLs. Be sure to verify the authenticity and download the proper attachments.  Otherwise, always reach out to the relevant procurement folks to ask again. Happy writting & tender hunting!  --future technical writer (#TechnicalWriterGuru) zithuniedward November 21 134,11,2023 10:23U=1
